definition: an expression of approval and commendation, express approval of
details:
noun
- an expression of approval and commendation
= example: an expression of approval and commendation
= synonyms: congratulations, kudos, extolment
- offering words of homage as an act of worship
= example: offering words of homage as an act of worship
verb
- express approval of
= example: express approval of
= synonyms: applaud, commend
